144008.en:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>This whole time, you've been locked in such a place...
Until now, we hadn't realized, we're sorry...<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144008.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>「ずっと　こんなところに
　閉じこめられてたんだね……。
　今まで　気付かなくて　ごめんなさい……。<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144008.ko:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>: 계속 이런 곳에 갇혀 있었구나…….
　그동안 알아차리지 못해서 미안해…….<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144008.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>原来你一直
都被关在了这里……
以前一直都没察觉到，对不起……<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144008.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>原來妳一直
都被關在這種地方……
對不起，之前都沒有察覺到……<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144009.en:
<start_lip_sync n02852 _normal m00001>We all remembered. About the evil god of nothingness'
vanguard and of the previous battle...<stop_lip_animation n02852 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144009.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02852 _normal m00001>「私たち　思いだしました。 
　虚無の邪神の先兵と
　戦っていたときのことを……。<stop_lip_animation n02852 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144009.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02852 _normal m00001>: 저희, 전부 떠올랐어요. 
　허무의 사신의 첨병과
　싸웠던 기억이…….<stop_lip_animation n02852 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144009.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02852 _normal m00001>我们全都想起来了。
与虚无邪神的手下
战斗时发生的事情……<stop_lip_animation n02852 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144009.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02852 _normal m00001>我們全都想起來了。
想起與虛無邪神的先鋒
戰鬥時所發生的事情……<stop_lip_animation n02852 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144010.en:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>It was an awfully brutal battle... How much time has
past, we do not know...<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144010.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>「とても　厳しい戦いでした……。
　どれだけ　時間がたったのか
　わからなくなるほどだったわ……。<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144010.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>: 정말 혹독한 싸움이었어…….
　얼마나 오랜 시간이 흘렀는지
　알 수 없을 정도였지…….<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144010.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>那是一场非常危险的战斗……
战斗之激烈甚至让人感受不到
时间的流逝……<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144010.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>那是一場非常危險的戰鬥……
戰鬥之激烈甚至讓人感受不到
時間的流逝……<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144011.en:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>Wherein you became our shield, and protected us from
Seal Demon Vogel's magic...<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144011.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>「そんな中　あなたは　私たちの盾となり 
　封魔フォーゲルが放った　魔法から
　守ってくれた……。<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144011.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>: 그러던 중 넌 우리의 방패가 되어
　봉마 포겔의 마법으로부터
　우릴 지켜줬어…….<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144011.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>战斗中，你为了保护我们，
独自挡下了
封魔弗盖尔放出的魔法……<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144011.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>戰鬥中，妳為了保護我們，
獨自擋下了封魔弗蓋爾
施放的魔法……<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144012.en:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>...So, that was the nothingness spell... Because of
it, we all forgot about you.<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144012.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>「……そう　あれは　虚無の魔法……
　そのせいで　私たちは　あなたのことを
　忘れていたのね。<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144012.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>: ……그래, 그건 허무의 마법……
　그 탓에 우린 지금까지
　널 잊고 있었던 거야.<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144012.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>……没错，那就是虚无魔法……
因此我们完全
忘记了你的存在。<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144012.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>……沒錯，那就是虛無魔法……
我們就是因為那個魔法
才會忘了妳的存在吧。<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144013.en:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>You protected us all and yet we did nothing to save
you... Truly, we are sorry.<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144013.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>「私たちを　守ってくれたのに
　助けてあげられなくて……
　本当に　ごめんなさい。<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144013.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>: 우릴 지켜줬는데
　구해 주지 못해서……
　정말 미안해.<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144013.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>你保护住了我们，
然而我们却无法救你……
真是对不起。<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144013.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>妳守住了我們，
然而我們卻救不了妳……
真是對不起。<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144014.en:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>Becoming everyone's shield was my duty. Like you all,
I was only carrying out my duty.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144014.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>「皆の盾となるのが　私の役目ですから。
　あなたたちと同じように　自分の役目を
　果たしただけですよ。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144014.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>: 여러분의 방패가 되는 것이 제 소임이니까요.
　여러분과 마찬가지로
　저도 제 소임을 다했을 뿐이에요.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144014.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>保护大家是我的职责，
和你们一样，
我只是履行了自己的职责而已。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144014.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>保護大家是我的職責，
和妳們一樣，
我只是履行了自己的職責而已。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144015.en:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>...Hey, enough with those faces. Meeting everyone again
like this, to be met with crying faces is a waste!<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144015.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>「……ほら　もう　そんな顔はやめて。 
　こうしてまた　皆で　再会できたのに
　泣き顔してちゃ　もったいないですよ！<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144015.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>: ……아이참, 이제 그만 기운 내세요.
　이렇게 모두 함께 다시 만났는데
　울상만 짓고 있을 거예요!?<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144015.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>……好啦，不要再露出那种表情啦。
大家明明又见面了，
却还一脸哭像岂不是很浪费！<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144015.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>……好啦，不要再露出那種表情了。
大家明明又見面了，
卻還一臉哭像豈不是太可惜了！<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144017.en:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>...Nevertheless, even though it had not reached you all,
my voice was heard; as expected of a fighting warrior
who has the 3 virtues, isn't it.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144017.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>「……それにしても　メナーたちにさえ
　届かなかった　私の声が聞こえたなんて
　さすが　３つの心を集めた　闘戦士ですね。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144017.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>: ……그나저나 메나 일행에게도
　닿지 않았던 제 목소리를 듣다니
　역시 3개의 마음을 모은 투전사답네요.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144017.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>……不过话说回来，我的声音
连美娜她们都听不到，你却能听到，
不愧是集结了３颗心的斗战士。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144017.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>……不過話說回來，我的聲音
連玫娜她們都聽不到，你卻能聽到，
不愧是集結了３顆心的鬥戰士。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144018.en:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>Now, in order to develop <pc> even further,
under the light's guidance, let us perform the
liberation of power.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144018.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>「さあ　<pc>のさらなる　成長のために
　光の導きのもと　チカラの解放を
　おこないましょう。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144018.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>: 자, {pc}|hpp(이,가) 한층 더 성장할 수 있게
　빛의 인도에 따라
　힘을 해방시켜 드릴게요.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144018.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>好了，为了<pc>能获得进一步成长，
在光之指引下
为你解放更加强大的力量吧。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144018.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>好了，為了<pc>能獲得進一步成長，
在光之指引下
解放更加強大的力量吧。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29100037.en: <start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>For your use during the ritual, I shall give you the Care Crest<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29100037.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>「あなたには　儀式で使う
　希望の紋章を　お渡ししておきます。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29100037.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>: 당신에게 의식에 사용할
　희망의 문장을 드릴게요.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29100037.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>我要将仪式使用的
希望纹章交给你。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29100037.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>我要將儀式使用的
希望紋章交給你。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29100038.en: <pc> was given the Care Crest!<se_nots System Item>
29100038.ja:
<pc>は
希望の紋章を　わたされた！<se_nots System Item>
29100038.zh-Hans:
<pc>收下了
希望纹章！<se_nots System Item>
29100038.zh-Hant:
<pc>收到了
希望紋章！<se_nots System Item>

144019.en:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>My name is Light Guide Minana... Under oath of our master,
the Sacred Light Lord, Warrior <pc>, I shall
guide you.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144019.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>「我が名は　光導使ミナナ……
　我らが主　聖光教主と　交わせし誓いのもと
　闘戦士　<pc>を　導かん。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144019.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>: 제 이름은 빛의 인도자 미나나……
　우리의 주인 성광교주님과 나눈 맹세에 따라
　투전사 {pc}|hpp(을,를) 인도하겠나이다.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144019.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>我是光导使米娜娜……
在我与我主圣光教主的誓约下，
前来引导斗战士<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144019.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>我是光導使美奈娜……
在我與我主聖光教主的誓約下，
前來引導鬥戰士<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144020.en:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>Guided by a profound purpose, having woven a beam of
light. When thousands of light beams converge, before
long, they inevitably become Sacred Light.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144020.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>「深遠なる意思に導かれ　紡がれし光芒。 
　幾千もの光芒集いて　束になれば
　やがて　聖光となるは必定なり。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144020.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>: 심오한 의지의 인도가 자아낸 한 줄기 빛.
　그 빛 수천이 모여 다발이 되니
　마침내 성광을 이루리로다.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144020.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>光芒在深远的意志引导下编织成形，
无数光芒汇聚在一起，终将成为圣光。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144020.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>光芒在深遠的意志引導下編織成形，
無數光芒彙聚在一起，
終將成為聖光。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144021.en:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>O Sacred Light, with your great gleaming, please rain
hope all around this chaotic world!<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144021.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>「聖光よ　その大いなる輝きをもって
　この混迷の世界に　あまねく降り注ぐ
　希望となりたまえ！<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144021.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>: 성광이여, 그 위대한 빛으로
　이 혼란한 세계를 널리 비출
　희망이 되어 주소서!<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144021.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>圣光啊，
请让那伟大的光辉洒遍这迷乱的世界，
成为希望吧！<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144021.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>聖光啊，請讓那偉大的光輝
灑遍這迷亂的世界，
成為希望吧！<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144022.en: <start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>...So then, hold the Caring Crest up high please.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144022.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>「……それでは
　希望の紋章を　高く　かかげてください。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144022.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>: ……그럼
　희망의 문장을 높이 치켜들어 주세요.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144022.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>……来吧，
高高举起希望纹章。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144022.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>……來吧，
高高舉起希望紋章。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144023.en: <pc> held the Caring Crest up to the sky.
144023.ja: <pc>は　希望の紋章を空高く　かかげた。

144024.en:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>Now, having woven the Sacred Light, open the next
path to raise Warrior <pc>'s power of
caring!<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144024.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>「今　聖光を紡ぎし 
　闘戦士　<pc>の　希望のチカラを捧げ
　次なる道を　切り開かん！<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144024.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>: 성광을 자아낸
　투전사 <pc>의 희망의 힘을 바쳐
　다음 길을 열리라!<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144024.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>织起圣光，
献上斗战士<pc>希望的力量，
开辟新的道路！<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144024.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>現在織起聖光，
獻上鬥戰士<pc>希望的力量，
開闢新的道路！<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144025.en: <start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>Now, with that, the liberation of power is finished.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144025.ja: <start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>「さあ　これでチカラの解放は　おわりました。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144025.ko: <start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>: 자, 이걸로 힘 해방은 끝났어요.<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144025.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>好了，这样就完成了力量的解放。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144025.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n04194 _normal m00001>好了，這樣就完成了力量的解放。<stop_lip_animation n04194 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144026.en:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>With that, this time you're ready to meet the Sacred
Light Lord, I'd say, aren't you!<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144026.ja:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>「これで　今度こそ　聖光教主さまに
　会う準備が　ととのったってわけね！<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144026.ko:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>: 이제 드디어 성광교주님을
　뵐 준비가 됐네!<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144026.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>这样一来，这次总算是完成了
谒见圣光教主大人的准备！<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144026.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n04057 _normal m00001>這樣一來，這次總算是完成
謁見聖光教主大人的準備了！<stop_lip_animation n04057 CLOSE_MOUTH>

144027.en: <start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>Finally, we're meeting them! Ahhh! What do we do!<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144027.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>「ついに　会えるんだー！
　あーん！　どうしよう！<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144027.ko:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>: 드디어 뵐 수 있어!
　아앙! 어떡하면 좋아!<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144027.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>终于能见到了！
啊～！该怎么办呀！<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
144027.zh-Hant:
